statement.p: In 38.1 of the last 21 days it rained. How many days did it not rain? days

solution.p: We recall that a percent as a decimal is part/whole. Here that is \displaystyle\frac{{P}}{{21}}={0.381}. We solve for P by multiplying by \displaystyle{21}. \displaystyle{P}={0.381}\cdot{21}={8.001}. We round that as requested to 8 to find the days it rained. How many days did it NOT rain?
